src.model.estimators

Build estimators to be used as the final step in a pipeline.

Baseline model: Logistic Regression Working model: SWIFT

src.model.estimators.baseline_estimator(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Returns a calibrated logistic regression estimator.

Parameters:

  • args (list) – positional arguments to pass to LogisticRegression

  • kwargs (dict) – keyword arguments to pass to LogisticRegression

Returns:

calibrated logistic regression estimator

Return type:

sklearn.calibration.CalibratedClassifierCV

src.model.estimators.swift_estimator(*args, **kwargs)[source]

Returns a calibrated SWIFT estimator.

Parameters:

  • args (list) – positional arguments to pass to LogisticRegression

  • kwargs (dict) – keyword arguments to pass to LogisticRegression

Returns:

calibrated logistic regression estimator

Return type:

sklearn.calibration.CalibratedClassifierCV
